actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 566, Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act, as amended, to raise the limitation of any single loan or advancement for watershed works of improvement.

summary.text: Amends the Watershed Protection and Flood Protection Act to increase from $5,000,000 to $10,000,000 the maximum allowable amount for single loans or advancements for watershed improvement projects.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 566, Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act, as amended, to raise the limitation of any single loan or advancement for watershed works of improvement.
